name: Attacking Practice
about: Soccer Attacking Drills focus on scoring goals by moving the ball forward to create chances.

name: Free kick
about: Every starting line up should preferably have 2 good free kick takers.

name: Left Corner Kick
about: Since I'm left footed, I would take much better corners from the left side because the ball would curve away from the goal.

name: Right Corner Kick
about: The aim of this study is to analyses the corner kicks taken in the matches played in the FIFA 2018 World Cup.

name: Penalty Kick
about: A penalty kick is a method of restarting play in association football

name: Goalkeeping
about: The goalkeeper should have his arms apart and have his weight slightly on his toes
